seo.title: Road Ready Safety – The modern way to finish your traffic course
seo.description: State-approved traffic school and defensive driving built to be simple. Start on your phone, finish anywhere. Instant digital certificate.

hero.h1: The modern way to finish your traffic course.
hero.sub: Approved where required, built to be simple. Start on your phone, finish on your laptop—pick up right where you left off.

finder.heading: Find the right course
finder.sub: Select your state and reason. If there are multiple options, we’ll show you the choices.
finder.helper: Leave “Course” as ‘Best option’ and we’ll recommend the right one.
finder.comingSoon: We’re adding courses for this state. Check back soon.

items.title: Learn on your schedule
items.body: Start, stop, and pick up anytime — your progress is always saved.

items.title: Satisfaction guarantee
items.body: Every course comes with a built-in guarantee for your peace of mind.

items.title: Shortest course allowed by law
items.body: No fluff. Just the approved minimum so you finish faster.

items.title: Works on any device
items.body: Mobile-first design works seamlessly on your phone, tablet, or desktop.

steps.title: Choose state & course
steps.body: Tell us where you're licensed and why you need the course.

steps.title: Take the course online
steps.body: Short, clear modules at your own pace on any device.

steps.title: Submit if required
steps.body: Some courts or insurers need documentation.

items.title: Secure checkout
items.body: Payments processed by Stripe with TLS/SSL encryption.
